Welcome to aop’s documentation!

aop is a Python module for astrophotographers and amateur astronomers that creates observation logs compliant with the aop standard [https://tolfersheim.ddns.net/index.php/s/GabziFRsMD7FLeY]. It offers powerful, yet simple and easy to understand observation logs.

Note

This project is under active development.
